verses.text: \w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, O ye \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \w is|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* poverty \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w*, \w yea|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* cast \w the|strong="H0853"\w* shoulder \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dung|strong="H6569"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* solemnities, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7725"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* equity, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* caused \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*: \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* made void \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* contemptible, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* base \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* accepted persons \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H0001"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*? hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* us? \w why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H3605"\w* doth \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* us despise \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, violating \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*?

Juda hath transgressed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Juda hath \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w married|strong="H1166"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w*, both \w the|strong="H0834"\w* master, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* scholar, \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* tabernacles \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3772"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* offereth \w an|strong="H3772"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* bellowing, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w regard|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0369"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* atonement \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* cause? \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* witness \w between|strong="H0996"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast despised: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* thy partner, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

\w Did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* residue \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*? \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* doth \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w then|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* despise \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* iniquity \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w garment|strong="H3830"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w despise|strong="H8130"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Wherein \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*? \w In|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* doth \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w such|strong="H1931"\w* please \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w or|strong="H0176"\w* surely \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*?
